summary: An ordinance repealing Ordinance No. 23091, creating Local Improvement District No. 2254, entitled: "An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of West Armour Street, form 15th Avenue West to 16th Avenue West, by grading and curbing the same and providing for the necessary surface drainage, all in accordance with Resolution No. 2504, of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improving district therefor, and providing for that payment for said improvement to be made by special assessment upon property in said district payable by the mode of \`Payment in Bonds', as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle", approved January 24, 1910, published January 28, 1910.
